nodes.text: Razor knucklers, also amalgamated as razorknucklers, or known simply as razors, were a bladed weapon used for close combat. The polished steel blades and edges gleamed when held in the light. Razor knucklers were favored by Black Sun thugs and assassins.

N-K Necrosis possessed a variant of this knuckler known as the Necrosis Nightblade during his time on Kashyyyk. An additional variant of this weapon known as a malevolent razorknuckler also existed inside the Cave of the Sher Kar on Mustafar.
